channel.title: RuneScape Remake - Looking for Developers Team
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.roonscape.org/img/rs_logo.png[/img][/center]
Apply to RoonScape since we are currently looking for one developer to finish the team, it is a huge project that we are currently working on and this may be your chance to enhance your skills to beyond.
[center][size=36pt]Progress of RoonScape[/size][/center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/C4ivG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fi9TR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mhNG9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/of4Tr.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0bB02.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gj0Fz.png[/img]
We are a group who never gives up, we nearly closed our project once until when my hope and inspiration came back by watching an old Pk video couple of days ago. So I am hoping that players who are looking foward to help us out, it is a huge consideration you need to keep in mind, that there are a lot of trials and errors will be involved in this project.
Our goal is to aim bringring back our childhood memories on restoring back, Runescape back in 2006, try to make near as perfect :rolleyes:
Furthermore by remaking Runescape, we are going to take care of a lot of time and make sure that all players are able to play RoonScape once the project is done, since most of developers never finish the project. But we are difference, our donations goes to our website managment and VPS, and we do care every single penny in order to keep the server running, provide the best experience to all players.
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: Are you experienced on coding: How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?:
//*****Other Info Below Here*****\\ I am not the owner of RoonScape, although I have got the authorization from Mod Johan to recruit developers, but for more information you could contact the owner of ther server: rune-king@hotmail.com
And register in our forums also: http://www.roonscape.org
Development Team - Mod Johan - Mod Zerak - Mod Rob - [It could be you]

item.title: RuneScape Remake - Looking for Developers Team
item.dc:creator: @massive_remake massive remake
item.description:
@massive_remake wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:25, topic:431223”][quote author=massive remake link=topic=533901.msg3910824#msg3910824 date=1328722691]

Why do you have 2 different accounts…

This thread is posted by an RoonScape staff, which I told him to do.
[/quote]
I wouldn’t give any staff to post MY server. That gives them the power to kick you out cause they can just edit the thread and say your nothing in it.[/quote]

Our team isn’t like that. Still searching for developers.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Remake - Looking for Developers Team
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Dylan

How old are you?: Almost 16

E-mail address?: "DylanV16@gmail.com", but i use Skype more often “dylan.vic”

Are you experienced on coding?: Yes

How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: Almost A Year Now

What time zone are you in?: Eastern Standard Time

How long will you be on everyday?: 2 - 3 hours on weekdays, Weekends Depend

Why do you want to become part of this server?: I’ve been bouncing from project to project for awhile now and would like to settle down and really work on something. And i feel here i wouldn’t have to worry about running out of things to work on or getting bored.

Any Suggestions?: No

Read full topic
